actors.name: Robert Downey Jr.
actors.bio: Robert Downey Jr. is an American actor known for his portrayal of Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. He has received critical acclaim for his performances and has become one of the highest-paid actors in the industry.

actors.name: Gwyneth Paltrow
actors.bio: Gwyneth Paltrow is an American actress and entrepreneur. She is known for her role as Pepper Potts in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Paltrow has also appeared in numerous other films and has won several awards for her performances.

actors.name: Jeff Bridges
actors.bio: Jeff Bridges is an American actor, singer, and producer. He has had a long and successful career in the entertainment industry, with notable roles in films such as 'Iron Man' and 'The Big Lebowski'. Bridges has received numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Actor.

actors.name: Edward Norton
actors.bio: Edward Norton is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his versatile performances in films such as 'Fight Club', 'American History X', and 'The Incredible Hulk', where he portrayed Bruce Banner. Norton has received critical acclaim for his acting skills.

actors.name: Liv Tyler
actors.bio: Liv Tyler is an American actress and former model. She gained recognition for her roles in films such as 'Armageddon' and 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy. Tyler portrayed Betty Ross in 'The Incredible Hulk' and has since appeared in various other projects.

actors.name: Tim Roth
actors.bio: Tim Roth is an English actor and director. He is known for his roles in Quentin Tarantino's films, including 'Reservoir Dogs' and 'Pulp Fiction'. Roth portrayed Emil Blonsky/Abomination in 'The Incredible Hulk' and has appeared in numerous other movies and TV shows.

actors.name: Chris Hemsworth
actors.bio: Chris Hemsworth is an Australian actor. He gained international recognition for his portrayal of Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Hemsworth's charismatic performance and physicality have made him a popular choice for action-oriented roles.

actors.name: Natalie Portman
actors.bio: Natalie Portman is an Israeli-American actress and filmmaker. She has received critical acclaim for her performances in films such as 'Black Swan' and 'Jackie'. Portman portrayed Jane Foster in the Thor films and has been involved in various other projects.

actors.name: Tom Hiddleston
actors.bio: Tom Hiddleston is an English actor and producer. He is best known for his role as Loki in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Hiddleston's portrayal of the complex and mischievous character has earned him a dedicated fan following.

actors.name: Chris Evans
actors.bio: Chris Evans is an American actor and filmmaker. He gained worldwide recognition for his portrayal of Steve Rogers/Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Evans has also appeared in various other films and has received critical acclaim for his performances.

actors.name: Hayley Atwell
actors.bio: Hayley Atwell is a British-American actress. She is known for her role as Peggy Carter in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Atwell's portrayal of the strong and determined character has made her a fan favorite.

actors.name: Hugo Weaving
actors.bio: Hugo Weaving is an Australian-English actor. He has appeared in numerous films, including 'The Matrix' trilogy, 'V for Vendetta', and 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy. Weaving portrayed the villainous Red Skull in 'Captain America: The First Avenger'.

actors.name: Scarlett Johansson
actors.bio: Scarlett Johansson is an American actress and singer. She is widely recognized for her role as Natasha Romanoff/Black Widow in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Johansson has received critical acclaim for her performances and has been nominated for several awards.

actors.name: Jeremy Renner
actors.bio: Jeremy Renner is an American actor and musician. He is known for his roles in films such as 'The Hurt Locker' and 'Arrival'. Renner portrayed Clint Barton/Hawkeye in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and has also appeared in other notable projects.

actors.name: Chris Pratt
actors.bio: Chris Pratt is an American actor known for his charismatic performances in films such as 'Guardians of the Galaxy' and 'Jurassic World'. Pratt portrayed Peter Quill/Star-Lord in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, earning him widespread acclaim and popularity.

actors.name: Zoe Saldana
actors.bio: Zoe Saldana is an American actress and dancer. She is best known for her roles as Gamora in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and Neytiri in the 'Avatar' film series. Saldana's performances have received praise for her ability to bring depth to her characters.

actors.name: Dave Bautista
actors.bio: Dave Bautista is an American actor and former professional wrestler. He gained recognition for his portrayal of Drax the Destroyer in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Bautista has since appeared in other films and has been praised for his comedic timing and physicality.

actors.name: Vin Diesel
actors.bio: Vin Diesel is an American actor, producer, and filmmaker. He is known for his portrayal of Groot in the 'Guardians of the Galaxy' films and the 'Avengers' series. Diesel has also starred in the 'Fast & Furious' franchise and has a dedicated fan base.

actors.name: Bradley Cooper
actors.bio: Bradley Cooper is an American actor and filmmaker. He gained recognition for his role as Rocket Raccoon in the 'Guardians of the Galaxy' films and the 'Avengers' series. Cooper has received critical acclaim for his performances in various other projects.

actors.name: Mark Ruffalo
actors.bio: Mark Ruffalo is an American actor, producer, and environmental activist. He is known for his portrayal of Bruce Banner/Hulk in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Ruffalo's performances have been praised for bringing depth and humanity to the character.

actors.name: Ben Kingsley
actors.bio: Ben Kingsley is an English actor. He has appeared in numerous films, including 'Gandhi', for which he won an Academy Award for Best Actor. Kingsley portrayed the Mandarin in 'Iron Man 3' and has been recognized for his versatile performances.
movies: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

actors.name: Chadwick Boseman
actors.bio: Chadwick Boseman was an American actor. He gained international fame for his portrayal of T'Challa/Black Panther in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Boseman's performance was widely acclaimed, and he became an icon for his significant contribution to black representation in film.

actors.name: Michael B. Jordan
actors.bio: Michael B. Jordan is an American actor and producer. He gained recognition for his roles in films such as 'Fruitvale Station' and 'Creed'. Jordan portrayed Erik Killmonger in 'Black Panther' and has been praised for his powerful performances.

actors.name: Lupita Nyong'o
actors.bio: Lupita Nyong'o is a Kenyan-Mexican actress and producer. She gained critical acclaim and won an Academy Award for her role in '12 Years a Slave'. Nyong'o portrayed Nakia in 'Black Panther' and has been recognized for her talent and advocacy.

actors.name: Danai Gurira
actors.bio: Danai Gurira is an American-Zimbabwean actress and playwright. She is best known for her role as Okoye in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Gurira's performances have been praised for her fierce and captivating presence on screen.

actors.name: Tom Holland
actors.bio: Tom Holland is an English actor and dancer. He gained international recognition for his portrayal of Peter Parker/Spider-Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Holland's youthful charm and acrobatic skills have made him a fan favorite.

actors.name: Zendaya
actors.bio: Zendaya is an American actress, singer, and model. She rose to prominence for her role in the Disney Channel series 'Shake It Up' and has since appeared in films such as 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' and 'Dune'. Zendaya's talent and activism have garnered widespread acclaim.

actors.name: Jake Gyllenhaal
actors.bio: Jake Gyllenhaal is an American actor and producer. He has received critical acclaim for his performances in films such as 'Brokeback Mountain', 'Nightcrawler', and 'Prisoners'. Gyllenhaal portrayed Quentin Beck/Mysterio in 'Spider-Man: Far From Home'.

actors.name: Benedict Cumberbatch
actors.bio: Benedict Cumberbatch is an English actor and producer. He gained recognition for his portrayal of Sherlock Holmes in the BBC series 'Sherlock' and has since appeared in numerous films, including 'Doctor Strange'. Cumberbatch's performances have been praised for his versatility and intensity.

actors.name: Rachel McAdams
actors.bio: Rachel McAdams is a Canadian actress. She gained international fame for her roles in films such as 'Mean Girls', 'The Notebook', and 'Midnight in Paris'. McAdams portrayed Christine Palmer in 'Doctor Strange' and has been recognized for her talent and range.

actors.name: Chiwetel Ejiofor
actors.bio: Chiwetel Ejiofor is a British actor and filmmaker. He has appeared in films such as '12 Years a Slave' and 'The Martian', earning critical acclaim for his performances. Ejiofor portrayed Karl Mordo in 'Doctor Strange' and has been praised for his acting skills.
